previous.excerpt: TeenUP was created to give kids a platform to learn new skills each day from their peers. The app allows kids to quickly and easily create short, unique, educational videos to share with friends and the world.
previous.title: TeenUp - A learning platform designed for teens by teens

localize.description: TeenUP的创立是为了给孩子们提供一个平台，让他们每天都能从同伴那里学到新的技能。该应用允许孩子们快速、轻松地创建短小、独特、有教育意义的视频，与朋友和世界分享。
localize.tagline: 由青少年设计的青少年学习平台

localize.description: TeenUP的創立是爲了給孩子們提供一個平臺，讓他們每天都能從同伴那裏學到新的技能。該應用允許孩子們快速、輕鬆地創建短小、獨特、有教育意義的視頻，與朋友和世界分享。
localize.tagline: 由青少年設計的青少年學習平臺

next.excerpt: DPO-as-a-Service at Legal Nodes is 5 times more efficient than a DPO in-house. The monthly package includes: ○ designation of a DPO at your company; ○ 2 requests from your users; ○ 2 30-min consultations; ○ a tailored GDPR roadmap; ○ 3 document templates.
next.title: DPO as a Service - GDPR compliance with DPO as a Service

localize.description: 法律节点的DPO即服务比内部的DPO效率高5倍。每月套餐包括 在您的公司指定一名DPO；○2个用户的请求；○2个30分钟的咨询；○一个量身定做的GDPR路线图；○3个文档模板。
